execution_plan.description: Find the category (id and name) with the highest number of products by counting products per category.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT c.id AS category_id, c.name AS category_name, COUNT(p.id) AS product_count
FROM categories c
JOIN products p ON p.category_id = c.id
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY product_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
